name: The CryptoRoom
description:
This game was produced in the CryptoGame Jam. I opened a Discord Server where we can talk about this and other projects of mine.

You have to build the ultimate computer to mine GameCoins( in game crypto currency).

Each Rack can support 2, 4 respectively 10 GPUs with 3 different models.

Be aware, the game has only one save slot, so if you save the game, everything will be rewritten.

Now you have a goal: have 1M money and have bought everything. Good Luck!

In the last update, I have added an universal linux build.

If you have any question, please don't hesitate to ask!
